title: Regression test idle session timeout
custom_preconds: There were changes made to the session timeout logic in the angular application that will require regression testing session timeouts. The actual React functionality does not need to be tested as it will be gated for 2023.14, however, we should regression test the stg environment once the .14 release is up to make sure nothing broke and the user is still logged out after 4 hours of inactivity and no sooner, and it should handle multiple open tabs.

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - When a player memo is sent, EBIS will send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
 - Deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the Advance Consent field to be auto-cleared
custom_preconds:
AC:

* If the Advance Consent date is prior to the Opening Day system date, the Advance Consent date on the player profile will be cleared 45 days after Opening Day
* If the Advance Consent date is on or after the Opening Day system date, the Advance Consent date will be cleared 46 days after the Advance Consent date
* If the player is outrighted or optioned, the Advance Consent date will be cleared
* If the player changes organizations (via trade or waiver claim assignment), the Advance Consent date will be cleared

title: As a Club User, I want to Release a player from an Minor League Injured List or an Minor League Inactive List
custom_preconds:
Context: Currently, Club users are unable to to submit a release for a minor league player that is on an Injured List or Inactive List.  Only BOC users are able to do this.

AC:

* Club users will be able to create and submit a â€œRelease of a Minor League Playerâ€� transaction for a player currently on an injured list
* Club users will be able to create and submit a â€œRelease of a Minor League Playerâ€� transaction for a player currently on an inactive list
* Club users should still be blocked from releasing players from the Restricted, Suspended, Disqualified, Ineligible, Military List, and Voluntarily Retired List
** BOC Users should continue to get an overrideable warning
* We will remove the current rule check for an Active MN Roster Status
* We will keep the current rule check preventing Optioned players from being released
* Players can be released prior to the earliest reinstatement date
* Warning text will be updated to reflect this change

!image-20231016-180115.png|width=2044,height=1292!

title: As an ebis waivers user I want to be able to view the current waiver priority
custom_preconds:
AC:

* In the â€œClaims/Results Expiringâ€� section of the Waivers screen, in the Player Results section, there will be a new â€œWaiver Priorityâ€� column
* There will be a â€œPriorityâ€� button in each row of the table (similar to the Cancel button)
* Clicking this button will open a modal that displays the current Waiver Priority Order for that player
* The order will be calculated on the fly to ensure the most up to date order is being displayed
* The modal will have an X icon that will close the modal
* Clicking outside the modal will also close it

title: As a EBIS User, I want see if a player has an active Advance Consent
custom_preconds:
AC:

* In the Misc section of the Service tab of Pro Player Profiles, there will be a new â€œAdvance Consentâ€� Field
* This field will be a data picker in edit mode
** Will default to current date
* This field is not required
* If a player has an Approved MJC that includes a 'Advance Consent Under Article XIX(A)(2)â€� covenant, the â€œAdvance Consentâ€� field will be populated with the signing date of the MJC
* If there is no such covenant in the playerâ€™s MJC, BOC Admin users can manually enter a date into this field
* This field is not editable to Club Users

title: AMT: As an Intl Admin, I want to ensure prospects have phone numbers entered prior to creating a Travel Authorization
custom_preconds:
Context: We recently added required phone number fields to prospect profiles in AMT.  If a prospect was created prior to this change, we are missing a phone number for the player.

AC:

* When a user clicks the â€œRequest Travel Authorizationâ€� button, the system will perform a check to see if the prospect has the required phone number fields populated on their profile
* If the check passes, the user will be brought to the next stage of the check in process
* If the check fails, the system will return a hard error for Club users and a overrideable warning:
** *Title:* Error
** *Body:* Prospect must have a phone number entered in order to request travel authorization.  Please contact BOC for assistance.
** *Buttons:* Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back

title: AMT: As an Intl Admin, I want to ensure prospects have phone numbers entered prior to checking in
custom_preconds:
Context: We recently added required phone number fields to prospect profiles in AMT.  If a prospect was created prior to this change, we are missing a phone number for the player.



AC:

* When a user clicks the â€œCheck Inâ€� button, the system will perform a check to see if the prospect has the required phone number fields populated on their profile
* If the check passes, the user will be brought to the next stage of the check in process
* If the check fails, the system will return a hard error for Club users and a overrideable warning:
** *Title:* Error
** *Body:* Prospect must have a phone number entered prior to check in.  Please contact BOC for assistance.
** *Buttons:* Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back

title: AMT: As an Intl Admin, I want to submit and approve a Travel Authorization with past dates
custom_preconds:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-21194|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-21194|smart-link]

Context: Currently, if a club tries to submit a Travel Authorization form with past travel dates, nothing happens.  The form just stays in preliminary.

AC:

* If a club user attempts to submit a Travel Authorization form with past travel dates, the system should return the following:
** *Title:* Error
** *Body:* The entered travel dates have already passed.  Please contact the BOC for assistance.
** *Buttons:* Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back
* BOC Users will be able to submit and approve the form

title: Configure ebis applications to start up without Okta
custom_preconds:
*As a* ebis developer

*I want* to be able to start ebis when OKTA is not running and use the break glass login only

*Acceptance Criteria*

* All ebis applications are able to start up when OKTA is down
* A configuration value exists to enable/disable okta authentication

title: Break glass login to bypass Okta
custom_preconds:
*As a* BOC Draft Admin

*I want* to be able to login to EBIS without using Okta

*So that* I can still run the draft in EBIS in case of an Okta outage



*Acceptance Criteria*

* Navigating to [https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/admin-login|https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/admin-login] displays a login form with Username/Password inputs
* A database table exists in ebis that allows developers to enter temporary allowed â€œbreak glassâ€� username/password combos
* Attempting to login to admin-login sends the credentials using Basic authentication and validates the username/password combo against the db
** On invalid creds, show an error message
** On valid creds, authorize as the specified user and forward to the ebis home page
* Subsequent requests after login use Basic authentication and validate credentials against the database on every request
** Invalid credentials result in a 401 response, which should redirect the user back to the normal [https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/login|https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/login] page
* On successful okta login through [https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/login|https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/login], admin login credentials are cleared and Okta access token is used again



*Technical notes*

* passwords should be stored encrypted
* angular (and eventually, react) apps should use localStorage['ebis-auth-store'] to store basic auth credentials. ebis-auth-store json object should only ever have either the basicAuthCredentials or the accessToken/idToken/refreshToken so that itâ€™s unambiguous which the http interceptor should use, however, if both are somehow present, favor the accessToken.

Provide architectural documentation to describe the implemention for InfoSec

title: Reports Dashboard - Add Rules & Regulations to Create New dropdown menu
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Go to the Reports page and select the MLB Documents tab (see: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1732|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1732|smart-link] )
* At the bottom of the widget, select the Create New dropdown arrow
** The dropdown options should include â€œRules & Regulationsâ€�
